reviewText: Like most Krav Maga training, there are some portions which pose legitimate questions regarding total effectiveness. 98% of the stuff he does on here is good, but 2% is clearly based on his larger, stronger frame and we were not able to replicate it in simulated training. But yeah, right now this is probably one of the best basic Krav Maga DVD sets, outside of Boaz Aviram's more in-depth Pure Krav Maga series.
